nodes.text: Mythra was a valuable substance found in the galaxy. The seal of office of the Solodoe ambassador Ketas was made of solid mythra. Its value led the Jedi diplomat to steal it during negotiations with the Plinovians on Station Zeta. When Resistance members Poe Dameron and Kazuda Xiono investigated a Darius G-class freighter which had been attacked by pirates, Xiono wondered if the freighter had been transporting gold, mythra, or spice.

Mythra was first mentioned in "Signal from Sector Six," a 2018 episode of the animated television series Star Wars Resistance. In Star Wars Legends, mythra was a precious metal first mentioned in the 1997 book Pirates & Privateers, a supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
